Serialized Form

Package edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.SpyNin

Class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.SpyNin.Board extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

grid

int[][] grid
The field grid represents the 9 by 9 grid in which the objects are placed. Once set, the Board should not change. This field is for objects that are able to "move" in the game. For example, the player and the ninjas.

difficulty

int difficulty
The field difficulty represents the difficulty of the game. The changes in difficulty determines how many ninjas spawn and/or initial player's life count.

staticGrid

int[][] staticGrid
This field staticGrid represents the 9 by 9 grid in which the objects are place. Once set, the Board should not change. This field is for objects that are unable to "move" in the game. For example, the briefcase, and the powerups.
